trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormViewUpdateEventArgs" /> that contains the event data.
Represents the method that handles the <see cref="E:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView.ItemUpdating" /> event of a <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView" /> control.
trans-unit.target: 表示处理 <see cref="E:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView.ItemUpdating" /> 控件的 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView" /> 事件的方法。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView> control raises the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView.ItemUpdating> event when an Update button (a button with its `CommandName` property set to "Update") within the control is clicked, but before the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView> control updates the record.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView>控件都将引发<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView.ItemUpdating>事件时的更新按钮 (带有按钮其`CommandName`属性设置为"更新") 在控件内单击时，之前<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView>控件更新记录。

trans-unit.source: This allows you to provide an event-handling method that performs a custom routine, such as HTML encoding or validating the values of a record before updating it in the data source, whenever this event occurs.
trans-unit.target: 这使您可以提供执行自定义的例程，如 HTML 编码或更新数据源中发生此事件时之前验证其值的记录的事件处理方法。

trans-unit.source: When you create a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormViewUpdateEventHandler> delegate, you identify the method that will handle the event.
trans-unit.target: 创建 <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormViewUpdateEventHandler> 委托时，需要标识将处理该事件的方法。

trans-unit.source: To associate the event with your event handler, add an instance of the delegate to the event.
trans-unit.target: 若要将事件与事件处理程序关联，请将该委托的一个实例添加到事件中。

trans-unit.source: The event handler is called whenever the event occurs, unless you remove the delegate.
trans-unit.target: 除非移除了该委托，否则每当发生该事件时就会调用事件处理程序。

trans-unit.source: For more information about event-handler delegates, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关事件处理程序委托的详细信息，请参阅[处理和引发事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。

trans-unit.source: The following example demonstrates how to programmatically add a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormViewUpdateEventHandler> delegate to the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView.ItemUpdating> event of a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView> control.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例演示如何以编程方式添加<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormViewUpdateEventHandler>委托给<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView.ItemUpdating>事件<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView>控件。

trans-unit.source: This example has a text box that accepts user input, which is a potential security threat.
trans-unit.target: 此示例具有一个接受用户输入的文本框，这是一个潜在的安全威胁。

trans-unit.source: By default, ASP.NET Web pages validate that user input does not include script or HTML elements.
trans-unit.target: 默认情况下，ASP.NET 网页验证用户输入是否不包含脚本或 HTML 元素。
有关详细信息，请参阅[脚本侵入概述](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07)。

trans-unit.source: The following example demonstrates how to declaratively add a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormViewUpdateEventHandler> delegate to the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView.ItemUpdating> event of a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView> control.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例演示如何以声明方式添加<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormViewUpdateEventHandler>委托给<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView.ItemUpdating>事件<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView>控件。
